Sympatholytics (Incomplete)

  • β-Blockers
    • Common Side Effects

β-Blockers

Drug Receptor Selectivity ISA Usual Maintenance Dose
Acebutolol β1 + 200-600mg BID
Atenolol β1 0 50-100mg QD
Betaxolol β1 0 10-20mg QD
Bisoprolol β1 0 5-10mg QD
Carteolol β1, β2 ++ 2.5-10mg QD
Carvedilol β1, β2, α1 0 25-50mg BID
Metoprolol Tartrate β1 0 50-100mg BID
Metoprolol Succinate β1 0 100-200mg QD
Nadolol β1, β2 0 40-80mg QD
Penbutolol β1, β2 + 20mg QD
Pindolol β1, β2 +++ 5-20mg BID
Propranolol β1, β2 0 Variable
Propranolol LA β1, β2 0 80-160mg QD
Timolol β1, β2 0 10-20mg BID
Labetolol β1, β2, α1 0 200-400mg BID

Common Side Effects

  • Bronchoconstriction (particularly those with β2 activity)
  • Fatigue
  • Depression
  • Nightmares
  • Sexual dysfunction
